verbose_text: Treatment with MK-801, a highly potent, selective glutamate antagonist, between 6 and 24 h after cerebral ischemia prevented delayed post-ischemic seizures and completely suppressed fetal EEG activity.
evidence: MK-801, a highly potent, selective glutamate antagonist, between 6 and 24 h after cerebral ischemia prevented delayed post-ischemic seizures and completely suppressed fetal EEG
